recipeInstructions.text: Put a pot of water on stove to heat up to simmer. Dice your onion at this stage and add you oil to pan to heat up slightly on medium heat.
Add your diced onions and saut√© gently for about 35 mins till soften and add you lamb mince.
Brown you mince and add diced tomatoes and season with salt.
Add your rocket and let wilt before adding your chunky pasta sauce.
At this stage taste your bolognese for salt, add to your taste. Be careful as will be hot. Let this mix bubble away for about 15 mins.
Check your water, once simmering and while the bolognese is cooking, add your gnocchi and stir once.
Once gnocchi floats to the surface, drain the water and return back to pot (off the heat). At this stage also turn your bolognese off.

This stage is up to you, you can use the entire bolognese or half. I used half and have saved the rest for another dish. Add your sauce to the gnocchi. Stir everything together, again taste for seasoning.
Divide into bowls and sprinkle Parmesan across the top. Enjoy! It's such an easy and quick dish
